name: Biodrone Battle
description: Fight hostile drones that try to keep their recently gained autonomy by either shooting or morphing into them.Biodrone Battle brings classic top-down action rooted in the pioneer gaming era of the 1980s into your living room.
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 capable graphics card Storage: 400 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Intense, fast-paced action. This game is hard in a Hotline Miami sort of way -- you die   a lot  , but the only penalty for death is that you have to try again. There's a lot of variety in level design, enemy AI, and strategy.
